alert.note: Alert for Muscogee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 5:51PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Muscogee County through 615 PM EDT... At 551 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Highland Park, or over Columbus, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and pea sized hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Bibb City, Saint Marys Hills, Edgewood, Highland Park, Laurel Hills, Green Island Hills, Sand Hill, Battle Park, Vista Terrace, Columbus Metropolitan Airport, Rose Hill, Kenwood, Custer Road Terrace, Benning Hills, Avondale, Benning Park, and Carter Acres. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately.
